attributes.action: Recognise the England football team with a reception in their honour
attributes.additional_details: Gareth Southgate and his team have shown remarkable fortitude on the back of overwhelming expectation. Respectfully and passionately furthering the course of the England national football team. Giving much to the country in a time beset with worry. They need to know their country appreciates them.
attributes.background: honour members of the England national football team, their management and their families with a reception held in their honour either by the prime minister, the royal family, or both

rejection.details: Gareth Southgate and all of the members of the England team did the country proud, but we can't accept petitions calling for the Government to honour or congratulate individual sport teams.
